name: WarpMare
description:
You are playing a teenager with reacuring nightmares, trying to face his deamons in the  dream world. Make your way trough the labirint, find the essence and focus power onto yourself to slay the monster that has been hunting you.

As you are in the dream world there are a lot of diferent art styles of maps in the game. The monsters you wil encounter are going to scale with you and so will their drop, but the deamon (final boos) hunting you will get stronger with time you spend in the dream world regardles of your level. You can use both Dream and Shadow esence to  enhance your imagination, but using Shadow esence while giving a greater boost will also speed up the growth of your deamon. The deamon also holds multiple forms with diferent stats so there will be segnificant diferences betwen the fights even on the same level.

If you find any glitches or other mistakes in the game, please let me know, I will be checking coments here every day for the next week and try to fiy it as soon as possible.
